Package ec.app.DMEtutorial.Fitness

Class MultiScaleSSIM

java.lang.Object
ec.app.DMEtutorial.Fitness.MultiScaleSSIM
public class MultiScaleSSIM extends Object
Multi-Scale SSIM implementation by: Gabriel Prieto Renieblas (gprietor at med.ucm.es) Department of Radiology, Faculty of Medicine, Complutense University Madrid, Spain Edited out everything unrelated to the core algorithm https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/plugins/mssim-index.html
